data.headline: Nursing Home Neglect: Unraveled Care
data.author_title: The Indianapolis Star and The Indianapolis News
data.summary: An investigative series uncovered disturbing levels of neglect and regulatory shortcomings in Indianapolis nursing homes, prompting immediate reforms from state officials.

data.headline: Spreading Hazards: Toxic Two-Time
data.summary: A series on how industries disposed of hazardous wastes as fertilizer was disseminated widely through e-mail and the web, which eventually led to significant reforms.

data.headline: Booming or Busting? Rising Bankruptcies
data.summary: A series analyzing local bankruptcy filings revealed the economic stress among lower-income residents, debunking myths about the wealth of those filing.
